MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG8 postcode area of Whithorn, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5.05pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Kevans substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.36pm on Friday 13th November 2020.
